name: Outline Runner
description:
Outline Runner is a parkour-shooter featuring bullet time.

There are currently six levels in the game, so the amount of content is fairly limited. The game features a timer, so you can get some replayability by grinding down your times.

Controls:

- WASD to Move

- Left Click to shoot

- Ctrl to slide

- Shift to dash

- Right Click to Slow Time

- R to Restart
